name: .ABCDDB File Extension
summary: Learn about .ABCDDB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by Address Book, a contact organization application; contains a contact list, in SQLite database format, of all the contacts stored within the Address Book application; regenerated when the Address Book application is opened; not meant to be manually opened.

content: The ABCDDB file can be found in the following directory:
UserHome(Home Icon) > Library > Application Support > AddressBook
NOTE: OS X Mountain Lion replaced the Address Book application with the Contacts application.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
